title: Zig Zag Background Pattern
description: In this lab, we will learn how to create a zig zag background pattern using CSS. By using linear-gradient() and adjusting the background-size and background-position, we will be able to create a visually appealing pattern that can be used on various elements of a website. This lab will help improve our CSS skills and give us a better understanding of how to use CSS to create unique designs.
